text: Hopea nervosa is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. ==References== nervosa Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Flora of Sabah Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea nervosa
